channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Microsoft Advertising Universal Event Tracking (UET)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Microsoft Advertising Universal Event Tracking (UET)

item.title: CVE-2022-2170|2024-08-03T00:32:08.642Z -- unknown -- microsoft%20advertising%20universal%20event%20tracking%20%28uet%29
item.description: The Microsoft Advertising Universal Event Tracking (UET) WordPress plugin before 1.0.4 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed. Due to the nature of this plugin, well crafted XSS can also leak into the frontpage.
